# [[listener]]s; [[audience]]

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|聽眾|tr=tīngzhòng}} and {{zh-l|觀眾}} are different; {{zh-l|聽眾|tr=tīngzhòng}} refers to a listening audience, such as a group of radio listeners, while {{zh-l|觀眾}} refers to an audience which is directly watching a public event, such as spectators at a stadium.
